attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many teenagers and children fell unsafe riding on pavements and have no other alternative to travel that by a bike. Some teenagers even die because of unsafe drivers on the roads. The age should be put up to help save many children's lives.

rejection.details:
According to the Highway Code: 
You MUST NOT cycle on a pavement. (http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/TravelAndTransport/Highwaycode/DG_069837)
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
